description: Creates clock number line for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for create_clock_number_line
result = create_clock_number_line(data)

educational_standards.description: Find the elapsed time in mathematical problems.
Write the time shown on the clock.
Find the elapsed time: word problems.
Solve word problems involving the subtraction of time intervals in minutes.

educational_standards.display_name: Finding the End Times Word Problems
educational_standards.description: Solve word problems to find the end time.
Represent time interval problems on a number line diagram.
Use the four operations to solve word problems involving intervals of time, including problems that require expressing measurements given in a larger unit in terms of a smaller unit.
Use rulers to measure objects in inches.
